ingredients.ingredient: 1 butternut squash, peeled, seeded and cubed
¼ cup sugar free maple flavored syrup

cookingTips: Cut vegetables into uniform chunks so they cook at the same rate
Drain boiled vegetables thoroughly before mashing to avoid a watery texture
Warm the maple syrup slightly before adding for better incorporation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a healthy, nutrient-rich side dish. Do you want to add butter or cream for richness, or keep it as is for a lighter version?
